summary: A big mushroom that can be used as house, with interior and a mysterious cave.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]None of these resources or parts of them may be used in paid mods[/b][/size][/color]

=============================
Stroti's Mushroom House Resource
=============================

by Stroti

converted by Tamira

This resource was originally created by Stroti for Oblivion.
You can find the original file here:
http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/46030/?

=============================

A big mushroom that can be used as house, with interior and a mysterious cave.
There are also some new (static) plants and a fence kit with ivy.

(No Smurfs included)

For an overview a demo esp is added. You can find the mushroom house west of Lake Ilinalta in the woods between Halfmoon Mill and Hunter's Rest. Â 
This demo house and location is only a showcase, it is not furnished and the interior is not navmeshed so you cannot bring a follower with you.

=====================================================

Content:
========

Mushroom House with door, interior and cave
6 different smaller mushrooms
Mushroom chair and mushroom table
Exterior lanterns with and without glow
Door-bell (not animated)
4 new (static) plants
New butterfly and new moth with green glow (both animated)
Fence kit, decorated with ivy, with an animated fence gate (to be added as door)
Glowing stone for the cave

=====================================================

Tools used:
=================

Nifskope
NifUtils by Skyfox
Gimp
Blender

=================
Permissions:
=================

This is a modders resource.You may use the meshes and textures for your own mods as long as you give credit and you do not charge money for it.

Do not upload to other sites.


=================
Credits:
=================

Stroti for his resources and for everything he has given to the TES community
The Niftools team for giving us Nifskope; special thanks to jonwd7 for his great new developments on this tool
Skyfox from the Niftools team for his great tool NifUtils
author: Stroti and Tamira
